attributes.review: This app took FORVER to download😠 after 6 hours of waiting, as soon as the app downloaded my phone got hacked. This is the worst app on the App Store. -10/10 WOULD NOT RECOMMEND. 😡
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: This app made my phone stop working because my phone is black with  a rainbow background pic!!!🥺

attributes.review: Terrible just looking at it. Hard to navigate through very horrible layout 😒

The app took 14 days to download. When it finally downloaded, I turned on the app and found that it was FAKE!!!!! Instead of a Trump app, it was a picture of a man’s ba-na-na swinging around in circles! VERY INAPPROPRIATE!! WHAT IF MY CHILD SAW!!!😡😡🤬
attributes.title: FAKe!!😡😡

attributes.review: This app took hours to download, mind you this is a new phone, and once it did it wouldn’t open 😰 I really wanted to see the giant cheeto puff talk and spread negativity ✨🧚🏻
attributes.title: Stupidest app ever 😔

attributes.review: worse app ever don’t get it !! has many glitches and it’s all around just a bad app also the president is a pedo and you shouldn’t get the app:)

attributes.review: THIS APP TOOK 4 WEEKS TO DOWNLOAD. I would never suggest getting this app It just destroys lives. It attempted to build a wall to keep me out for some odd reason. Worst app the the store easily.
attributes.title: Chris Peacock

attributes.review: this review doubles as a plead to ask apple to add “zero stars” and “negative stars” because it is honestly that bad. since the day i downloaded this app, i have broken my legs every morning, and every afternoon i have broken my arms. at night i lay awake in agony until my heart attacks put me to sleep. do not download this app. or this president.
attributes.title: zero stars pls

attributes.review: This app is just terrible it has taken so long to download just for it to not even work and crash😡
